Christal - Keynote Speaking
Would you like to bring your students a message that is fun, relevant, active and that will result in inspiring change? Do you want to work with someone who will take the time to listen and work with you, your team and your budget?
Dynamic. Thought Provoking. Entertaining.
Christal is an inspiring communicator who has spoken to hundreds of thousands of students in Canada and around the world
Christal wants to work with you!
ENGAGE
Christal's keynotes and workshops for 2014 are focused on the theme of the value of each of our lives, and the power we have to be agents of hope and change.
INSPIRE
As the co-founder of Live Different (an international youth empowerment charity), Christal inspires her audience to consider the power and potential of their lives.
CHANGE
Christal leads her audience on a journey to change the way they think first: It starts here and it starts with each of us making a decision about who we want to be.
What others are saying
"Christal Earle is a bright, courageous woman, completely dedicated to making a difference in our world. She is a remarkable individual who lives her passion, to empower young people to overcome obstacles and succeed in life." Dr. Gordon Barnhart, former Lieutenant Governor of Saskatchewan
"Your motivational presentations to our group were so positive and compelling. I realize that we are a little out of your typical client demographic, however you did such a wonderful job explaining how our members could make a difference - and it certainly worked!" Dave Henderson, Ontario Home Builders Association
"Christal consistently receives rave reviews from those in her workshops and has the ability to connect with everyone in the room. Not only is she phenomenal at giving a workshop presentation she is also amazing to work with." Angela Cacciavillani, Ontario Student Leadership Conference Coordinator
